title: ClusCite: Effective Citation Recommendation by Information Network-Based Clustering

author: Xiang Ren, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign

segmentation: Good afternoon everyone.

Let's look at example here.

To summarize, we studied this citation recommendation problem in the context of heterogeneous people 50 network and we propose cross site framework which tried to organize papers, citations into interest group and desired class based models and finally lead to papers specific recommendation an we showed experimental results for the significant improvements over state of the art method.
